title.en: Aspiration for the Spread of the Teachings

text.en: Master of the oceanic teachings of the Ancient Translations,kamaandterma,
Sovereign of all the teachings, Khyentse Wangpo,
And pioneer of the Five Treasuries, Lodrö Thayé—
text.en-trans: dzö ngé shingta lodrö tayé kyi

text.en: May your tradition never fade but grow further and further.
text.en-trans: ringluk mi nyam lané lar pel shok

text.en: May this supreme, unchanging support for the three turnings of the Dharma Wheel,1
text.en-trans: chökhor nam sum ten chok gyurwamé

text.en: This sanctuary where the teachings remain without ever fading,
text.en-trans: mi nub tenpé tsé su zhukpé ling

text.en: Be filled with disciplined members of the saṅgha community,
text.en-trans: trimden düpé tsok kyi yong gangné

text.en: And may the teachings of scripture and realization flourish and endure.
text.en-trans: lungtok tenpa dargyé yün né shok

text.en: May everyone exert themselves continuously in the ten dharmic activities.2
May the activities of renunciation and study continue without interruption.
text.en-trans: pang dang lokpé trinlé gyün mi ché

text.en: And through the power and strength of the saṅgha's true indivisibility,
May all be auspicious for the teachings to spread in a hundred directions.
text.en-trans: tenpa chok gyar pelwé tashi shok
